column8: Adam arriving at the MACC headquarters in PutrajayaMalaysian Anti-Corruption Commission officers questioned Ampang PKR Youth chief Adam Rosly over his sources of wealth on Friday.“They questioned me for about four hours. They asked about many things, mainly my sources of wealth.“I gave them all they needed to prove how I amassed my wealth.“I would like to congratulate the MACC for their professionalism. They did a good job and they showed that they are transparent,” Adam, 28, told reporters outside the MACC headquarters.Adam’s political opponents had questioned how he had gotten rich at a young age without using corrupt means.TMlIDDbuARYRed Shirts leader Datuk Seri Jamal Yunos claimed that Adam’s “castle” bungalow in Ampang was worth RM7mil, which was denied by Adam, who said it was worth RM1mil.Adam had said that he made his wealth through businesses and family inheritance.http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...BicCIl51Huvj.99
Good job MACC. Do this to more politicians from both sides
“I gave them all they needed to prove how I amassed my wealth" = DAMN, burn i guess ppl from the opposite side can't say such things
donation also need "proof" mah  rich ppl here use donation to avoid income tax but all with proofno proof one different setory lah
